label: RANDOM
description: No Selection or Random selection

label: PCR
description: target enrichment via PCR

label: RANDOM PCR
description: Source material was selected by randomly generated primers.

label: RT-PCR
description: target enrichment via

label: HMPR
description: Hypo-methylated partial restriction digest

label: MF
description: Methyl Filtrated

label: repeat fractionation
description: Selection for less repetitive (and more gene rich) sequence through Cot filtration (CF) or other fractionation techniques based on DNA kinetics.

label: size fractionation
description: Physical selection of size appropriate targets.

label: MSLL
description: Methylation Spanning Linking Library

label: cDNA
description: PolyA selection or enrichment for messenger RNA (mRNA); synonymize with PolyA

label: cDNA_randomPriming
description: N/A

label: cDNA_oligo_dT
description: N/A

label: PolyA
description: PolyA selection or enrichment for messenger RNA (mRNA); should replace cDNA enumeration.

label: Oligo-dT
description: enrichment of messenger RNA (mRNA) by hybridization to Oligo-dT.

label: Inverse rRNA
description: depletion of ribosomal RNA by oligo hybridization.

label: Inverse rRNA selection
description: depletion of ribosomal RNA by inverse oligo hybridization.

label: ChIP
description: Chromatin immunoprecipitation

label: ChIP-Seq
description: Chromatin immunoPrecipitation, reveals binding sites of specific proteins, typically transcription factors (TFs) using antibodies to extract DNA fragments bound to the target protein.

label: MNase
description: Identifies well-positioned nucleosomes. uses Micrococcal Nuclease (MNase) is an endo-exonuclease that processively digests DNA until an obstruction, such as a nucleosome, is reached.

label: DNase
description: DNase I endonuclease digestion and size selection reveals regions of chromatin where the DNA is highly sensitive to DNase I.

label: Hybrid Selection
description: Selection by hybridization in array or solution.

label: Reduced Representation
description: Reproducible genomic subsets, often generated by restriction fragment size selection, containing a manageable number of loci to facilitate re-sampling.

label: Restriction Digest
description: DNA fractionation using restriction enzymes.

label: 5-methylcytidine antibody
description: Selection of methylated DNA fragments using an antibody raised against 5-methylcytosine or 5-methylcytidine (m5C).

label: MBD2 protein methyl-CpG binding domain
description: Enrichment by methyl-CpG binding domain.

label: CAGE
description: Cap-analysis gene expression.

label: RACE
description: Rapid Amplification of cDNA Ends.

label: MDA
description: Multiple Displacement Amplification, a non-PCR based DNA amplification technique that amplifies a minute quantifies of DNA to levels suitable for genomic analysis.

label: padlock probes capture method
description: Targeted sequence capture protocol covering an arbitrary set of nonrepetitive genomics targets. An example is capture bisulfite sequencing using padlock probes (BSPP).

label: other
description: Other library enrichment, screening, or selection process.

label: unspecified
description: Library enrichment, screening, or selection is not specified.
